meanings.definition: The middle part or point of something.
meanings.sent1: In the midsts of the forest, we found a hidden clearing.
meanings.sent2: She stood in the midsts of the room, unsure of what to do next.
meanings.sent3: The cat found itself in the midsts of a playful game of chase with a squirrel.
meanings.sent4: As the storm raged on, the ship was caught in the midsts of the turbulent sea.
meanings.sent5: The treasure was hidden in the midsts of the old, abandoned house.

meanings.definition: The position of being surrounded by something.
meanings.sent1: Lost in the midsts of the crowd, she searched for her friend.
meanings.sent2: The castle was built in the midsts of the lush green valley.
meanings.sent3: The little mouse found itself in the midsts of a circle of curious cats.
meanings.sent4: The lone tree stood tall in the midsts of the vast desert.
meanings.sent5: The cabin was nestled in the midsts of the snowy mountains.
